Translations.Text: ya beni israile-zkuru ni`metiye-lleti en`amtu `aleykum veevfu bi`ahdi ufi bi`ahdikum veiyyaye ferhebun
veaminu bima enzeltu musaddikal lima me`akum vela tekunu evvele kafirim bih. vela testeru biayati semenen kalila. veiyyaye fettekun
vela telbisu-lhakka bilbatili vetektumu-lhakka veentum ta`lemun
ete'murune-nnase bilbirri vetensevne enfusekum veentum tetlune-lkitab. efela ta`kilun
veste`inu bissabri vessalah. veinneha lekebiratun illa `ale-lhasi`in
ellezine yezunnune ennehum mulaku rabbihim veennehum ileyhi raci`un
